description: This file contains the implementation of a WebSocket Transport Object for an HTTP server, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization functions. It manages object construction, resource management, and communication interfaces within a C-based object-oriented programming style.

classes.name: HTTP_WEBS_TRANS_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents the WebSocket transport object managing HTTP WebSocket sessions and communication interfaces.

classes.name: HTTP_TMH_INTERFACE
classes.description: Interface for transport management callbacks including notification and serialization functions.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE HttpWstoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new HTTP WebSocket Transport Object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpWstoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Deallocates resources associated with the WebSocket transport object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpWstoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls necessary subordinate objects and interfaces required by the transport object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpWstoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the transport object, setting default values and function pointers.
